function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in demand for energy for cooling indoor environments in summer","Impact":"Higher energy consumption, increased cost, and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Use of suitable materials, green walls, and roofs along with urban microclimatic control to reduce the need for air-conditioning","Technologies":"Green roofs, green walls, and urban microclimatic control systems","People":"Residents, building occupants, and the environment","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building developers"},{"Description":"Absorption of polluting agents and reduction of fine dust","Impact":"Improved air quality and reduced health risks","Mitigation":"Installation of green walls and roofs to promote evaporation and absorption of pollutants","Technologies":"Green walls and roofs with advanced filtration systems","People":"Residents, local communities, and the environment","Owner":"Environmental agencies, building developers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Promotion of well-being and social relationships through green elements","Impact":"Improved mental and physical health, reduced prevalence of various pathologies","Mitigation":"Integration of green spaces for physical and leisure activities to promote well-being and social interaction","Technologies":"Design and creation of green spaces within urban environments","People":"Residents, city dwellers, and communities","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, and community organizations"}]}
